nodes.text: Wristband blades or wrist-blades were gauntlet mounted ejectable blades.

Wristband blades were multi-centimeter, jagged, ejectable blades housed in a line down the length of a gauntlet. They were most notably used by Jango Fett in his fight with Obi-Wan on Kamino, in order to stop himself from falling off the landing platform which they were fighting on.
Modified protocol droids used as gladiator droids onboard The Wheel were equipped with wrist-blades.
